alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 4:58PM EDT until March 25 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blakely, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blakely, Arlington, Douglasville, Damascus, Parksville, Rock Hill, Colomokee, Cuba, Commissary Hill, Turman, Ferrell Crossroads, Early Co A/p, Old Damascus, Hentown, Kolomoki Mounds Sp, Dickey and Rowena. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
